ILLEGAL_MOVE - com.chess.board.MoveStatus
 
isAttack() - Method in class com.chess.board.Move.CaptureMove
Since this is a CaptureMove class it is defined to be an attacking move, capturing a piece of the opponent therefore we override the isAttack() from the parent class and we return true
isAttack() - Method in class com.chess.board.Move
isAttack() is a boolean method that returns false for the Move class because not all moves in a chess game is an attacking or capture move so we can state it to be false always but we will override it for specific child classes of move
isAttack() - Method in class com.chess.board.Move.PawnPromotion
isAttack() is being override here to see if the move attacks another piece
isBlack() - Method in enum com.chess.Color

isCastled() - Method in class com.chess.player.Player
 
isCastlingMove() - Method in class com.chess.board.Move
isCastlingMove() is a boolean method that returns false for the Move class because most moves made is not a castling move so we can state it to be false here but override it for the specific child class later on

isTileOccupied() - Method in class com.chess.board.EmptyTile
isTileOccupied() is a boolean method that always return false for the case of the EmpytyTile because by definition EmptyTile does nat have any piece on it therefore it is always not occupied
isTileOccupied() - Method in class com.chess.board.OccupiedTile
Overrides the isTileOccupied() method in the parent class to always return true because by definition an OccuppiedTile always has a piece on it
